Soap dispenser as a candle holder: Fill the soap dispenser with wax and add a wick. Use it to make a unique candle holder.
Soap dispenser as a bird feeder: Fill the soap dispenser with birdseed and hang it outside. Use it to feed the birds in your area.
Soap dispenser as a birdhouse: Cut a hole in the soap dispenser and use it as a birdhouse.
